overview: Matriarchy prevails while at an institution men dressed in underwear train for their purpose: to please the stronger sex. They are surveilled by strict women in pink uniforms, with their whistles ready. But when the relentless routine becomes too difficult, you can always dream yourself away. Keep an eye out for Tarjei Sandvik Moe (Isak in Skam) in one of the roles in this diabolically funny film.
title: Hemale Education
